title: The White House Takes To Tumblr
teaser: President Obama will focus on higher education and how to reduce student loan debt in the conversation.
contentencoded:
President Obama will host his first ever Tumblr Q&A today at 4 p.m. Eastern time.

The conversation will focus on higher education and how to reduce student loan debt.

The Wall Street Journal’s Jason Bellini tells Here & Now’s Meghna Chakrabarti why this social media platform stands out and what makes it so popular.

  • Visit the White House Tumblr
  • Visit Here & Now’s Tumblr

Guest

  • Jason Bellini, senior producer for The Wall Street Journal. He tweets @jasonbellini.
